00023 #ifndef ENUM_HPP
00024 #define ENUM_HPP

00026 #include "object.hpp"

00028 namespace uStreamLib {
00034         class US_API_EXPORT Enumeration : public Object {
00035         public:
00039                 Enumeration(void);
00040 
00044                 virtual ~Enumeration(void);
00045 
00053                 int32 init(uint32 size);
00054 
00062                 bool hasMoreElements(void)
00063                 {
00064                         return (m_uCurItem < m_uCount);
00065                 }
00066 
00072                 void* nextElement(void)
00073                 {
00074                         void* retval = m_peiCur->value;
00075 
00076                         m_uCurItem += 1;
00077                         m_peiCur += 1;
00078 
00079                         return retval;
00080                 }
00081 
00089                 void* nextElement(uint32* item_size);
00090 
00095                 void rewind(void)
00096                 {
00097                         m_peiCur = m_peiItems;
00098                         m_uCurItem = 0;
00099                 }
00100 
00104                 void clear(void)
00105                 {
00106                         m_peiCur = m_peiItems;
00107                         m_uCount = 0;
00108                         m_uCurItem = 0;
00109                 }
00110 
00115                 uint32 getCount(void)
00116                 {
00117                         return m_uCount;
00118                 }
00119 
00124                 uint32 getSize(void)
00125                 {
00126                         return m_uSize;
00127                 }
00128 
00136                 void addElement(void* item, uint32 size);
00137         private:
00138                 /* enumeration item type */
00139                 struct EnumItem {
00140                         /* pointer to the real value */
00141                         void* value;
00142 
00143                         /* size of the item */
00144                         uint32 size;
00145                 };
00146 
00147                 /* array of enumeration items */
00148                 EnumItem* m_peiItems;
00149 
00150                 /* total count of items */
00151                 uint32 m_uCount;
00152 
00153                 /* size of enumeration */
00154                 uint32 m_uSize;
00155 
00156                 /* current item index */
00157                 uint32 m_uCurItem;
00158 
00159                 /* current item pointer */
00160                 EnumItem* m_peiCur;
00161         };
00162 }
